named-query.name: correlated
named-query.query: select u from User u where ( select count(i) from Item i where i.seller = u ) > 1

named-query.name: uncorrelated
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.amount + 1 >= ( select max(b2.amount) from Bid b2 )

named-query.name: exists
named-query.query: select i from Item i where exists ( select b from Bid b where b.item = i )

named-query.name: quantifyAll
named-query.query: select i from Item i where 10 >= all ( select b.amount from i.bids b )

named-query.name: quantifyAny
named-query.query: select i from Item i where 101.00 = any ( select b.amount from i.bids b )
